body:
Comment 1: 
The semi colon *is* needed.

Semicolons are separators. So

if x {
  y
}

is fine.

if x {
  y;
}

is also fine, in the same way that commas are optional at the end of a list.

However

if x {
  y
  z
}

is not ok. y and z need a separator (semicolon) between them.
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
